generic.title: Tell Us About Your Business
generic.question: Which of the following are true?
generic.footerText: To learn more about ${mediaAreaText} permits, visit ${mediaAreaLink}.

questionnaireOptions.hazardousMedicalWaste: My business will generate `hazardous waste|hazardous-waste` or `medical waste|medical-waste`.
questionnaireOptions.compostWaste: My business will `compost waste|compost-waste` on site.
questionnaireOptions.treatProcessWaste: My business will treat or process waste.
questionnaireOptions.constructionDebris: My business will process `construction/demolition debris|construction-and-demo-debris` and recyclable materials.

land.mediaAreaLink: [NJDEP’s page on the Watershed and Land Management Program](https://dep.nj.gov/wlm/)

questionnaireOptions.takeOverExistingBiz: My business will take over an existing business or a site where a business used to be.
questionnaireOptions.propertyAssessment: My business will carry out `property assessment|property-assessment` work at the site.
questionnaireOptions.constructionActivities: My business will carry out construction activities on a site affecting 0.25 or more acres of land.
questionnaireOptions.siteImprovementWasteLands: My business will carry out site improvement in or near wetlands or flood hazard areas. This includes activities such as cutting down trees.

summary.partOne: Based on your answers, your business may be legally required to have a Department of Environmental Protection (DEP)
summary.partTwo: license or permit. Find out your business's requirements below.

personalizedSupport.title: Contact DEP’s Small Business Assistance Program (SBAP)
personalizedSupport.body: An expert at SBAP can help you figure out which licenses or permits your business needs. SBAP does not regulate or enforce environmental rules.

contactDep.title: Contact DEP
contactDep.body: To find out which licenses or permits you need, contact the ${bodyLink}

lowApplicability.summaryLineOne: You most likely will not need to apply for licenses or permits with the Department of Environmental Protection (DEP).
lowApplicability.summaryLineTwo: Visit [DEP’s Permits, Applications & Registrations page](https://dep.nj.gov/permits-applications-registrations/) for more information about your license and permit needs.
lowApplicability.callout: If your business activities or equipment change at any point,
